info.title: Sample API
info.description: Optional multiline or single-line description in [CommonMark](http://commonmark.org/help/) or HTML.

servers.description: Optional server description, e.g. Main (production) server

get.description: Optional extended description in CommonMark or HTML.

200.description: A JSON array of user names

x-code-samples.source:
Example:
    Headers:
        “email” : “mary@lamb.com“
        “password” : “Pass@1234”

The above API authenticates user with email `mary@lamb.comand passwordPass@1234`.
